CONFIG.ua: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/130.0.0.0 Safari/537.36 Edg/130.0.0.0

values: 上面的；地势较高的；地位较高的；上层的（尤指同类或一对中的一个）；上游的；靠上部的；更高级的；更上级的；向北部的；内陆的
兴奋剂；鞋帮；鞋面（鞋子的一部分）；上牙托（用于矫正牙齿）

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 至上的；最高的；最主要的
最高地；最重要地；最突出地

word_group.brief_definition: 坚定沉着；感情不外露；坚忍
楼厅后坐；上层环形观众席
高级中学；高中；大龄学生部
上游；上游河段；江河上游

bilingual.source: The upper shelf is too high for me to reach.
bilingual.target: 上面的架子对我来说太高了。

bilingual.source: The maxillary bone supports the upper teeth.
bilingual.target: 上颌骨支撑着上面的牙齿。

bilingual.source: The upper floor has a better view of the park.
bilingual.target: 上面的楼层可以更好地看到公园。

bilingual.source: The upper branches of the tree are full of birds.
bilingual.target: 树的上面的枝头上满是鸟。
Jim 住在上面的一个套间。

bilingual.source: Ah, yes, this is the upper Berg.
She wears braces on her upper teeth.

bilingual.target: 我不知道。是上面的住户吧。

bilingual.source: But the upper teeth are immensely long.
bilingual.target: 但是上面的牙齿异常地长。

bilingual.source: On an upper balcony lined with gas tanks.
bilingual.target: 在上面的阳台内衬的油箱。

list.abstract: Upper是数据库函数，用于将字符串中的小写字母全部转换成大写字母输出。

yingyinNormal.en: That part left over after the tasty bit, the top half, had been scoffed by them, which is where the term "upper crust" is thought to have been born.
yingyinNormal.zh: 取出好吃的部分，也就是上面的那一半，剩下的那部分，也就是被他们嘲笑的那些，这也就是"上流社会"这个词的由来了。

yingyinNormal.en: Yeah, right. We upper east siders don't do lazy.
yingyinNormal.zh: 对了，曼哈顿的名流们从不懒惰。

yingyinNormal.en: Hey, upper east siders. It's Christmas in New York.
yingyinNormal.zh: 上东区的人们，现在是纽约圣诞节时分。

yingyinNormal.en: Wait, upper east side unity? Technically, that's upper west side, dad. How are you helping?
yingyinNormal.zh: 上东区？准确说，应该是上西区，爸爸。你怎么瞎掺和？

yingyinNormal.en: Who is basically everything I hate about the upper east side.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这个几乎集东部贵族区陋习于一身的女孩。

yingyinNormal.en: And from no bra on the Upper East Side to no panties in Times Square.
yingyinNormal.zh: 现在从上东区的不穿乳罩穿越到时代广场的不穿内裤。

yingyinNormal.en: We're going now. Come with us. Where are your seats? We're upper deck.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们现在就走，一起去吧。你们的座位在哪里？我们在顶层露台上。

yingyinNormal.en: Asher. Come on, Jenny. Tonight you're hosting your first upper east side party.
yingyinNormal.zh: 阿瑟... 来吧，珍妮，今晚你还要主持你的首次上东区派对呢。

yingyinNormal.en: This is so exciting. Soon, my upper lip will be the same fake blonde as my beautiful best friend.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好兴奋哦，我唇上的汗毛很快会跟我美丽好友一样有着好看的假金色了。

yingyinNormal.en: We also know that if the bottom tranches fail at over 8%, the upper tranches are affected. They go to zero.
yingyinNormal.zh: 而且如果低级份额超过8%就违约，那高级份额就会受影响，它们会变成零。

yingyinNormal.en: Are you jealous you didn't get to sleep with him first? There had to be somebody left on the upper east side.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你没和他先睡，你妒嫉吗？你不可能把东区的人都睡遍吧。

yingyinNormal.en: Georgia, have you ever refused to rate any of these bonds upper tranches AAA? Can we see the paperwork on those deals?
yingyinNormal.zh: 格鲁吉亚，你是否拒绝过给这里的任何一家公司的AAA评级？我能看看这些交易对应的材料吗？

yingyinNormal.en: Using this equation in the upper left, I'm projecting that we need to win at least 99 games in order to make it to the postseason.
yingyinNormal.zh: 由左上角这个方程可知，要想进季后赛，我们至少得赢99场。

yingyinNormal.en: We started detecting gravitational anomalies almost 50 years ago. Mostly small distortions to our instruments in the upper atmosphere.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们从五十年前就开始探测到引力异常现象，多数是小的畸变，在大气层上层的仪器中。

yingyinNormal.en: What makes this a perfect place to grow are the terrific soils, bright, sunshiny blue skies, temperatures that range 95 to 100 degrees during the summer, cooling down into the upper 60 at night.
yingyinNormal.zh: 让这里成为完美种植场的原因就是肥沃的土地，明媚的阳光，湛蓝的天空，夏天稳定在95-100华氏度的日间气温，在晚上温度则降到60华氏度。

yingyinNormal.en: On the upper deck of the next carriage there is a conductor's compartment. It's a small office containing a strongbox. Inside is a loaded handgun. Get to it. You are authorized to use whatever force necessary.
yingyinNormal.zh: 旁边车厢的二楼有一个乘务员室，里面有一个保险箱，箱内有一把上膛的手枪，找到它，必要时你可以使用任何武力。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: It's based on a somewhat fantasised, very white, very <highlight>upper</highlight>-middle-class ideology.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它是基于一种有点幻想的，非常白人中上层阶级的意识形态。

examination_example.sentence: "I still grew up in an <highlight>upper</highlight> middle-class home with parents who didn't have college degrees," Schneider said.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 施耐德说：“我仍然成长在一个中上阶级家庭，父母没有大学学历。”

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: The researchers concluded that there was an <highlight>upper</highlight> limit to the correlation between homework and achievement.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 研究人员得出结论，家庭作业和成绩之间的相关性有一个上限。

examination_example.sentence: Architects have identified three main holes in the structure, the main hall and the <highlight>upper</highlight> rooms to the north of the central aisle.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 建筑师已经确定了该建筑的三个主要孔洞，即主厅和中央走廊以北的上层房间。

examination_example.sentence: Minor issues such as <highlight>upper</highlight> respiratory(上呼吸道的)infections can't be thoroughly evaluated by a doctor who can't listen to your heart.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 上呼吸道感染等小问题无法由听不到你心脏声音的医生彻底评估。

examination_example.sentence: An <highlight>upper</highlight>-second class degree, from an elite university.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 来自精英大学的二级以上学位。

examination_example.sentence: Countries Rush for <highlight>Upper</highlight> Hand in Antarctica.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 各国争相在南极洲占上风。

examination_example.sentence: Making sure to obtain an <highlight>upper</highlight>-second class degree.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 确保获得二级以上学位。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Following this, students had to complete a difficult mental math task in front of the same <highlight>upper</highlight>-year students.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 接下来，学生们必须在同样的高年级学生面前完成一项困难的数学脑力任务。

examination_example.sentence: In this study, students came into the laboratory and were asked to give a public speech in front of <highlight>upper</highlight>-year students.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在这项研究中，学生进入实验室，并且要在高年级学生面前发表公开演讲。

examination_example.sentence: Mail that was already processed in New Orleans facilities was moved to an <highlight>upper</highlight> floor so it would be protected from water damage.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 已经在新奥尔良处理过的邮件被转移到了高楼层，这样邮件就不会因为沾水而造成损坏。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: During the training stage, each dog was shown only the <highlight>upper</highlight> half or the lower half of the person's face.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在训练阶段，每只狗只看到人的上半张脸或下半张脸。

examination_example.sentence: Instead of a courtyard room, I'd like a room with a view, preferably on an <highlight>upper</highlight> floor.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我想要一个能看到风景的房间，最好是在楼上，而不是院子里的房间。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: People will live on the <highlight>upper</highlight> floor, the lower floor will be used for traffic, shops and factories.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 上层住人，下层用于交通、商店和工厂。

examination_example.sentence: His eyes moved from the <highlight>upper</highlight> part of his body down to his legs.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他的视线从上半身移到了腿上。

examination_example.sentence: How did Jay Stone feel about his <highlight>upper</highlight> body?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 杰伦·斯通感觉上半身如何？

examination_example.sentence: He had the <highlight>upper</highlight> body of a six feet boy.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他有一个六尺男孩的上身。
